roleset.name: exit
roleset.note: EMERGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emerge' based on annotation-on-the-fly of financial subcorpus. Member of verbnet class appear-48.1.1; class also includes result, come, develop, rise, and turn_up, but I don't feel that any of those apply. (from emerge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: exit, emerge
example.text: PS of New Hampshire will emerge from bankruptcy proceedings.

roleset.name: come to be seen as
roleset.note: EMERGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emerge' based on annotation-on-the-fly of financial subcorpus. Member of verbnet class appear-48.1.1; class also includes result, come, develop, rise, and turn_up, but I don't feel that any of those apply. (from emerge.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: blessed are the peacemakers
example.text: More importantly, he emerged as a peacemaker last summer after the Central Park rape of a white jogger.
example.arg: after the Central Park rape of a white jogger.
